original: iti atra yadyapi uparyyadho vetipadaṃ nāsti tathāpi mahākapilapaśñvarātroktavāstu- śarīrāvasthitinirupaṇenoparikramo labhyate tad yathā - mastake saṃsthito rudraḥ karṇayostasya saṃsthitau parjanyaśvāditiścaiva mukhe cāpaḥ susaṃsthitaḥ āpavatsaḥ sthitaḥ kaṇṭhe jayantaśca ditiḥ punaḥ skandhayoḥ pañcārgalādyā mahendrādyā bhujaddaye vakṣaḥsthau rudrasāvitrī dāsastu savitā tathā hastau tu hṛṅgatau tasya brahmā nābhī vyavasthitaḥ pṛthvīdharo marīciśca stanayoḥ kukṣigau punaḥ vivasvān mitranāmā ca pādayoḥ pitaraḥ sthitāḥ śāradātilakam tatkarṇasūtrobhayataḥ koṣṭhaddandeṣu deśikaḥ śavaṃ guhaṃ cāryyamaṇaṃ jṛmbhakaṃ pilapicchakam ||
analyzed: iti atra yadi api upari adhas vā iti padam na asti tathā api mahā kapilapaśñvarātra ukta vāstu śarīra avasthiti nirupaṇena upari kramaḥ labhyate tat yathā mastake saṃsthitaḥ rudraḥ karṇayoḥ tasya sthitāḥ śāradātilakam tad karṇa sūtra ubhayatas deśikaḥ śavam guham ca āryyamaṇam jṛmbhakam pilapicchakam

original: pāpādyāścaiva pūṣādyāḥ sapta saptorujaṅghake indro medre sthitastasya jayo vṛṣaṇasaṃsthitaḥ ||

original: iti rudra īśānaḥ dāso rudrajayaḥ pṛthvīdharo mahodharaḥ marīcirāyryaḥ pitaraḥ nirṛtiḥ pāpo rogaḥ indraḥ śakraḥ iti jñeyam yaduktam-īśaśveśānarudro'sau tajjayo rudradāsakaḥ marīcirāyyakaḥ khyātaḥ pitā syādrākṣasādhipaḥ ||
analyzed: iti rudraḥ īśānaḥ dāsaḥ rudrajayaḥ pṛthvīdharaḥ mahodharaḥ marīcirāyryaḥ pitaraḥ nirṛtiḥ pāpaḥ rogaḥ indraḥ śakraḥ iti jñeyam yat uktam īśa śva īśāna rudraḥ sau tad jayaḥ

original: pāpo roga iti khyātaḥ iti anyatrāpi-dhāṭavanī samāśritya kṛtvā cādhaḥ padattrayam sāvittramarcayettattra pade vāsavasaṃjñake vidhisāvittrayormadhye savitāraṃ padattra ye āśritya pitṭadhātārau kṛtvā cādhaḥ padatra yam yajedindra' mahābhāgaṃ pade lokasusaṃjñake tathā cendrajayaḥ pūjyo brahmaśakrasumadhyagaḥ āśritya vāyudhātārau kṛtvā cādhaḥ padavayam tattra devaṃ yajedrudraṃ pade bhuvanasaṃjñake tatheśavedhasormadhye tajjayaśca padavaye aiśānyāmāpakaṃ kāmapadattrayasusaṃsthitam tadāpavedhasormadhye yajeda vatsa' padattraye ||
analyzed: pāpaḥ rogaḥ iti khyātaḥ iti anyatra api dhāṭavanī samāśritya kṛtvā ca adhas pada trayam sāvittram arcayet tattra pade vāsava saṃjñake vidhi sāvittrayoḥ madhye savitāram āśritya pitṭa dhātārau vatsa padattraye

original: iti somaśambhāvapi-sāvitre raktapuṣpāṇi vadbhādhaḥ koṇakoṣṭhake tadadhaḥkoṣṭhake dadyāt savitre ca kuśodakam haridraudanamindrāya rakṣo'dhaḥ koṇakoṣṭhake indrajayāya miṣṭānnamindrādhastānnivedayet rudrāya ṣṭatasiddhānnaṃ vāyukoṇādhare pade tadadho rudrajayāya māṃsamādraṃ nivedayet āpo'tha śivakoṇādhastaddatsāya ca tattale ||
analyzed: iti soma śambhau api sāvitre rakta puṣpāṇi koṇa koṣṭhake tad adhas koṣṭhake dadyāt savitre ca kuśa udakam haridrā odanam indrāya rakṣaḥ koṇa koṣṭhake indrajayāya nivedayet rudrāya

original: iti agre tatkarṇasūtrobhayataḥ iti karṇasūtrasya prayojanatvādatra koṇārḍakoṣṭhetyuktam ||

original: taditi diśatyupadiśati śiṣthebhyo manvāniti deśiko māntrikaḥ tṛtīyaḥ paṭalaḥ carakīñca vidārīcca pūtanāmarcayet kramāt arcayed dikṣu pūrkhādi sāḍīdyantapadeṣvimān ||
analyzed: tat iti diśati upadiśati śiṣthebhyaḥ manvān iti deśikaḥ māntrikaḥ tṛtīyaḥ paṭalaḥ carakīn ca pūtanām arcayet kramāt arcayet dikṣu sāḍīdi anta padeṣu imān

original: aṣṭāvaṣṭau vibhāgena devān deśikasattamaḥ kramādīśānaparjanyajayantāḥ śakrabhāskarau ||
analyzed: aṣṭau aṣṭau vibhāgena devān deśika sattamaḥ kramāt īśāna parjanya jayantāḥ śakra bhāskarau

original: satyo vṛṣāntarikṣau ca diśi prācyāmavasthitāḥ agniḥ pūṣā ca vitatho yamaśca gṛharakṣakaḥ ||
analyzed: satyaḥ vṛṣa antarikṣau ca diśi prācyām avasthitāḥ agniḥ pūṣā ca vitathaḥ yamaḥ ca gṛha rakṣakaḥ

original: gandharbo bhṛṅgarājaśca mṛgo dakṣiṇadiggatāḥ nirṛti dauvārikaśca sugrīvavaruṇau tataḥ ||
analyzed: gandharbaḥ bhṛṅgarājaḥ ca mṛgaḥ dakṣiṇa diś gatāḥ dauvārikaḥ ca sugrīva varuṇau tatas

original: puṣpadantāmurau śeṣarogau pratyagdiśi sthitāḥ vāyurnāgaśca mukhyaśca somo bhallāṭa eva ca argalākhyo dityaditī kuverasya diśi sthitāḥ ||
analyzed: puṣpadanta amurau śeṣa rogau pratyak diśi sthitāḥ vāyuḥ nāgaḥ ca mukhyaḥ ca somaḥ bhallāṭaḥ eva ca argala ākhyaḥ diti aditī kuverasya diśi sthitāḥ

original: uktānāmapi devānāṃ padānyāpūrvvapañcabhiḥ rajobhisteṣvathaitebhyaḥ pāyasānnairbaliṃ haret ||
analyzed: uktānām api devānām rajobhiḥ teṣu atha etebhyaḥ pāyasa annaiḥ balim haret

original: sarvatra kramāditi vahyādiparitaḥ iti kramo'nusandheyaḥ sājīdyanteti arthe ca te ādyante ca aḍādyante aḍādyantābhyāṃ saha varttamānāni yāni padāni teṣu idacca karṇasūtreṇā'rddhākṛtakoṇakoṣṭhato labhyate ||
analyzed: sarvatra kramāt iti vahi ādi paritas iti kramaḥ nusandheyaḥ arthe ca te ādi ante ca aṭ ādi ante aṭ ādi antābhyām saha varttamānāni yāni padāni teṣu idam ca karṇa sūtreṇa ā ṛddhākṛta

original: balividhānamāha uktānāmiti pañcabhī rajobhiḥ sarvvatobhadramaṇḍale vaṣyamāṇaiḥ tatra kamalāni vacyamāṇaprakāreṇaiva pūrayet tatra madhyapadma' śveta- manyāni raktāni taduktaṃ divyasārasvate - madhye padānāṃ navakaṃ mārjayitvā prapūrayet sitena rajasā bhūyastaddikṣu ca catasṛṣu ||
analyzed: bali vidhānam āha uktānām iti pañcabhiḥ rajobhiḥ sarvatobhadra maṇḍale tatra kamalāni vacyamāṇa prakāreṇa eva pūrayet tatra madhya padma śveta manyāni raktāni tat uktam divyasārasvate madhye

original: ṣaṭkaṃ sammārjya rajasā raktena paripūrayet śiṣṭāni ca padānyatra yathāsthānaṃ prakalpayet ||
analyzed: ṣaṭkam sammārjya rajasā raktena paripūrayet śiṣṭāni ca padāni atra yathāsthānam prakalpayet

original: iti padasīmārekhāḥ khetāḥ padāni ca vicitrāṇi vāstudevānāṃ dhyānaṃ tantrāntaroktaṃ likhyate-uktānāṃ sarvvadevānāṃ svarūpañca nigadyate akṣamālāṃ sucaṃ [vaṃ] dace vāme daṇḍakamaṇḍalum ||
analyzed: iti pada sīmā rekhāḥ khetāḥ padāni ca vicitrāṇi vāstu devānām dhyānam tantra antara uktam likhyate uktānām sarvva devānām svarūpam ca nigadyate akṣamālām sucam vaṃ dace vāme daṇḍa

original: śāradātilakam dadhānamaṣṭanayanaṃ yajenmadhye'mbujāsanam sarve caturbhujā devā vāstudehe vyavasthitāḥ ||

original: kkṛtāñjalipuṭāḥ sarve khaṅgakheṭakapāṇayaḥ brahmāṇaṃ saṃnirīkṣante tadaknuābhimukhāśca te ||
analyzed: kṛta añjali puṭāḥ sarve khaṅga kheṭaka pāṇayaḥ brahmāṇam saṃnirīkṣante tad aknu abhimukhāḥ ca te

original: svasvasthāne sthitāścaiva sādhāraṇamudāhṛtam marīciḥ khetavarṣaḥ syād vivasvān rakta varṇakaḥ ||
analyzed: sva sva sthāne sthitāḥ ca eva sādhāraṇam udāhṛtam marīciḥ kheta varṣaḥ syāt vivasvān rakta varṇakaḥ

original: śātakumbhasamo mitraḥ kṛṣṇavarṇastu bhūdharaḥ savitā nīlavarṇābhaḥ sāvitro dhūmmravigrahaḥ ||
analyzed: śātakumbha samaḥ mitraḥ kṛṣṇa varṇaḥ tu bhūdharaḥ savitā nīla varṇa ābhaḥ sāvitraḥ dhūmmra vigrahaḥ

original: indraścāruṇavarṇābhaḥ śuklaśvendrajayastathā rudraḥ prabālasadṛśaḥ poto rudrajayastathā ||
analyzed: indraḥ ca aruṇa varṇa ābhaḥ rudraḥ prabāla sadṛśaḥ potaḥ rudrajayaḥ tathā

original: āpo gokṣoradhavala āpavatso japādyutiḥ īśānaḥ cīradhavalaḥ parjanyo'ñjanasannibhaḥ ||
analyzed: āpaḥ go kṣora dhavalaḥ āpa vatsaḥ japā dyutiḥ īśānaḥ cīra dhavalaḥ parjanyaḥ ñjana sannibhaḥ

original: jayanto'ññjanasaṅgāśo mahendraścā maladyutiḥ ādityo raktavarṇaḥ syāt satyakaścitravarṇakaḥ ||
analyzed: jayantaḥ mahendraḥ ca mala dyutiḥ ādityaḥ rakta varṇaḥ syāt satyakaḥ citra varṇakaḥ

original: vṛṣo vanbūkapuṣpābhaḥ kundābhaścāntarikṣakaḥ udyaddinakarābho'gniḥ pūṣā raktājasannibhaḥ ||
analyzed: vṛṣaḥ vanbūka puṣpa ābhaḥ kunda ābhaḥ ca antarikṣakaḥ udyat dinakara ābhaḥ gniḥ pūṣā rakta aja sannibhaḥ

original: bhṛṅgarājaśca bhṛṅgābho mṛgo jīmūtasannibhaḥ | nirṛtiḥ pāvakābhaśca poto dauvārikaḥ smṛtaḥ ||
analyzed: bhṛṅgarājaḥ ca bhṛṅga ābhaḥ mṛgaḥ jīmūta sannibhaḥ nirṛtiḥ pāvaka ābhaḥ ca potaḥ dauvārikaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: sugrīvo nīlakaṇṭhābhaścandrābhaḥ puṣpadantakaḥ | varuṇaḥ sphaṭikābhāṅgo bhṛṅgābhaścāsuro mataḥ ||
analyzed: sugrīvaḥ nīlakaṇṭha ābhaḥ candra ābhaḥ puṣpadantakaḥ varuṇaḥ sphaṭika ābha aṅgaḥ bhṛṅga ābhaḥ ca asuraḥ mataḥ

original: ṣaścotpalasaṅkāśaḥ pāpayackṣme ndranolavat | vāyuḥ kṛṣṇābhavarṇaḥ syānnāgaḥ śavendusannibhaḥ ||
analyzed: vāyuḥ kṛṣṇa ābha varṇaḥ syāt nāgaḥ śava indu sannibhaḥ

original: mukhyo mauktikasaṅgāśo bhallāṭaḥ śvetapadmavat | somaḥ sphaṭikasaṅgāśo'glo raktotpaladyutiḥ ||
analyzed: mukhyaḥ mauktika saṅga āśaḥ bhallāṭaḥ śveta padma vat somaḥ sphaṭika saṅga āśaḥ rakta utpala dyutiḥ

original: ditiḥ kundendudhavalā kapilā cāditiḥ smṛtā | carako śaṅkhasadṛśo vidārī pāvakadyutiḥ ||
analyzed: ditiḥ kunda indu dhavalā kapilā ca aditiḥ smṛtā śaṅkha sadṛśaḥ vidārī pāvaka dyutiḥ

original: pūtanā himasaṅkāśā meghābhā pilapicchikā | khaṅgaśca pānapāttraṣca kurikāṃ karttarīṃ tathā ||

dadhānāḥ bhīma rūpāḥ tāḥ rākṣasyaḥ parikīrttitāḥ

original: sito raktaśca potaśca kṛṣṇaḥ skandādikā grahāḥ ||

original: vaṣva śaktiñca khaṅgaśca pāśaśca vikkṛtānanāḥ | dadhānā bhoṣaṇāḥ proktā grahāḥ skandādikāśca te|

analyzed: dhanyā prāṇā viśālā ca sthirā bhadrā jayā niśā virajā vibhavā ca etāḥ nāḍyaḥ saumya mukhāḥ smṛtāḥ

original: tatra pratidaivataṃ balidravyabhedā mantrāñcoktāḥ mahākapilapaccarātle - pāyasaudanalājaiśca yuktaṃ dhūpaiḥ prasūnakaiḥ akṣataṃ tilasaṃyuktaṃ māṣabhaktādimaṇḍitam|

original: | iti | śāradātilakam | tattra yathopadeśaṃ prayogo likhyate | atha yajamāna ācāryya tṛṇuyāt | tata ācāryo vacyamāṇalacaṇāṃ bhūmiṃ parigṭahya vacyamāṇamārgeṇa tacchuddhiṃ vidhāya pañcabrahmabhiḥ pañcagavyairbhūmiṃ siñcet | tanmadhye kanakaśalākayā ratnena vā tadabhāve rajataphalapuṣpadhānyānāmanyatamena vā - śāntā yaśovatī kāntā viśālā prāṇavāhinī satī ca sumanā nandā subhadrā navamī matā ||
analyzed: iti śāradātilakam tat tra yathopadeśam prayogaḥ likhyate atha yajamānaḥ ācārya tṛṇuyāt tatas ācāryaḥ vacyamāṇa lacaṇām bhūmim parigṭahya vacyamāṇa mārgeṇa tad śuddhim vidhāya pañca brahmabhiḥ

original: iti nava rekhāḥ prāgaparāyatāḥ dakṣiṇopakramā udagapavargā vilikhya - hiraṇyā suvratā lakṣmīrvibhūtirvimalā priyā jayā kalā viśokā ca navamī saṃsmṛtā budhaiḥ ||
analyzed: iti nava rekhāḥ prāc aparāyatāḥ dakṣiṇa upakramāḥ udak apavargāḥ vilikhya hiraṇyā suvratā lakṣmīḥ vibhūtiḥ vimalā priyā jayā kalā viśokā ca navamī saṃsmṛtā budhaiḥ

original: | iti nava rekhā dakṣiṇottarāyatāḥ paścimopakramāḥ pūrvasamāptikā vilikhya tataḥ śuktaḍorakādinā tāḥ samyannimīya pūrvoktaprakāreṇa pañcarajobhirmaṇḍitaṃ pūrvoktakoṇakoṣṭhacatuṣṭayopetaṃ vicittraṃ maṇḍalaṃ racayet | tatpaścimadiśi hastamātraṃ trimekhalaṃ kuṇḍaṃ sthaṇḍilaṃ vā vidadhyāt | tato bahiḥkoṇakoṣṭhasthān gurugaṇeśadurgācetrapālān catuṣpadaṃ nābhigaṃ brahmāṇam tatpūrvvadiśi catuṣpadaṃ vāmastanagamāyyakam ityādi ardhapadagāmaditiṃ karṇagāmityantaṃ pūrvoktatattatpadaṃ tadaṅgasthitān tripañcāśaddevān padārthānusamayena brahman ihāgaccha iha tiṣṭheti sarvānāvāhya praṇavādinamo'ntena caturthantasvasvanāmamantreṇa pādyādibhirupacāraiḥ prapūjayet | tato maṇḍalādośānakoṇe avraṇamakkaṣṇamūlaṃ bahirdadhyacatavibhūṣitaṃ cūtāvatyanyagrodhoḍumbarapnakṣapallavasaṃcchnamukhaṃ vastrayugānvitam antarniciptapañcaratnavi- vidhaphalaṃ nirmalajalapūrṇa dṛr̤heṃ kalasam akṣatānāmupari sthāpayet | tata imaṃ me varuṇa iti varuṇagāyattrayā varuṇaṃ kalase nyaset | gaṅgāyāḥ saritaḥ sarvāḥ samudrāśca sarāṃsi ca | āyāntu yajamānasya duritakṣayakārakāḥ ||
analyzed: iti nava rekhāḥ dakṣiṇa uttara āyatāḥ paścima upakramāḥ pūrva samāptikāḥ vilikhya tatas śukta ḍoraka ādinā tāḥ samyak nimīya pūrva ukta prakāreṇa pañca rajobhiḥ maṇḍitam pūrva ukta padārtha anusamayena brahman iha āgaccha iha tiṣṭha iti sarvān āvāhya praṇava ādi namaḥ ntena caturtha anta sva sva nāma mantreṇa pādya ādibhiḥ upacāraiḥ prapūjayet tatas bahis vastra yuga anvitam durita kṣaya kārakāḥ

original: ityanena tīrthānyāvāhya avasthānagajasthānavalmīkanadīsaṅga‌madbhadagokularathyātaḥ sapta mṛttikā ānīya kalase nikṣipya vaṃ varuṇāya namaḥ” iti mantreṇa tatra kalase pañcopacāraiḥ varuṇaṃ pūjayet | tataḥ - murā māṃsī vacā kuṣṭaṃ śaileyaṃ rajanīdvayam | śaṭī campakamustacca iti sarvoṣadhośca prakṣipet | tataḥ kuṇḍādisamīpametya saṃskārādi agnimukhāntaṃ karma kṛtvā brahmāditripañcāśaddevebhyaḥ aṣṭottarasahasramaṣṭottaraśatamaṣṭāviṃśatimaṣṭau vā pratyekaṃ yavairvā kṛṣṇatilairvā udumbaratadatiriktakṣīraṣvakṣīyapālāśakhadirāpāmārga- tṛtīyaḥ paṭalaḥ
